item.title: IBM + Red Hat: Bamboozles, Foozles, and the Hybrid Cloud Chimera
item.description: This post explores how IBM is bamboozling the world (and possibly themselves) with their Red Hat-driven hybrid cloud ‘strategy’ and heralded spinoff, featuring examination of the technological, financial, and market foozles of the past and of the forseeable future.
